body.p:
410
May 20th 4
J. S. Higdon Esq
Smiths Grove Ky
Sir

Your letter of the 19th inst to his Excellency Gov Bramlette has been referred to me for reply. I have the honor to state that commissions will only be given to those who recruit, and to rank according to the number of men they raise. If you are disposed to recruit you are hereby authorized to do so, and you will take rank according to the number of men you raise.

Very Respectfully
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky
